result.execSummary:
The defendant Scott D Schoessow was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Narcotic Drugs, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(am).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Consecutive to: Jail time in case 13CM395

miscConds.notes:
Court costs due during period of supervision.
Pay supervision fees.
  If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, in addition to all other enforcement sanctions available to the court, a civil judgment enforceable by all creditors' remedies shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.
Defendant to participate in drug and/or alcohol counseling and treatment deemed appropriate by DOC and to pay all costs of treatment

Court orders absolute sobriety.  No possession/consumption of any intoxicants.
  Not to possess or consume controlled substances or prescription medication w/out a valid prescription.

Defendant to submit to random testing
Submit to DNA sample and pay surcharge

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Scott D Schoessow

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: To probation supervisor regarding unpaid court ordered financial obligations, copy to defendant.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Scott D Schoessow
Current: 7021 W. Pioneer Rd, Mequon, WI 53097 United States  (Effective: 06-23-2014)
Prior: N87 W7019 Evergreen Ct 202, Cedarburg, WI 53012

Defendant Scott D Schoessow in court with attorney Martin R Tanz.  Defendant in custody. Patti L Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Plea questionaire filed. Court examines defendant, accepts change of plea and finds defendant guilty. Joint recommendation given by the State. Court renders sentence.
Further proceedings on June 19, 2014 at 10:00 am.
Further proceedings on June 19, 2014 at 01:15 pm.

Attorney Martin R Tanz in court; defendant Scott D Schoessow not in court, in custody.  Adam Y Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Waiver form filed. Court examines defendant, accepts said waiver and binds matter over for trial. State informs. Counsel waives reading of Information and enters not guilty plea.  Further proceedings scheduled for June 19, 2014 at 01:15 pm.

State by DA Adam Gerol.  Defendant in custody & appearing by video conrferencing from the Ozaukee County Jail and by Atty Alme Boaz.  Counsel states defendant does qualify for public defender representation and matter may be appointed out.  Court advises the defendant of the penalties.  Court finds probable cause.  Counsel advises the defendant is on a probation hold, requesting status of prelim hrg; waiving timelimits.  State requesting $2500 cash bail w/conditions.  Court orders $2500 cash bail w/condition:  no controlled subst/prescrip medic unless prescribed.  Court orders matter adj to 5/19 at 10 am for status on prelim hrg.
